From Akshay Kumar To Farah Khan, B-Town Celebs Are In Awe Of ‘Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga’
From Akshay Kumar To Farah Khan, B-Town Celebs Are In Awe Of ‘Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga’
After scrapping Indian Penal Code's Section 377 and decriminalising same-sex love, Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga, a mainstream movie with a lesbian love story, comes as a breath of fresh air. It’s a daring film, which is breaking stereotypes in many ways.
Did you know the movie has been written by a trans-woman?
Twitter
Ghazal Dhaliwal has been writing dialogues and screenplays for many films including Lipstick Under My Burkha, Wazir and Qarib Qarib Single, but Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga is a historic win for her.
thereviewmonk.com
Starring Sonam Kapoor, Anil Kapoor, Rajkummar Rao and Juhi Chawla, the story of Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga revolves around Sonam Kapoor’s character’s lesbian affair, which is strongly opposed by her father, a character played by Anil Kapoor in the movie.
The movie has released today, and Bollywood stars are quite impressed with the film. From Akshay Kumar to Farah Khan, everyone has been lauding Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga. Take a look!
